markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bouncy Goblin](/Feats.aspx?ID=999) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 37 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Unbreakable Goblin](/Heritages.aspx?ID=20) heritage

</column>

---

You have a particular elasticity that makes it easy for you to bounce and squish. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) (or another skill of your choice, if you were already trained in Acrobatics). You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Acrobatics checks to Tumble Through a foe’s space.

<title level="2">Bouncy Goblin leads to...</title>
[Roll with It (Goblin)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1009)
name: Bouncy Goblin
